top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [OData Paging â€“ Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374630))

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [OData Paging - Skip]( http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374631)

count.name: $count
count.description: Include count of items, see [OData Count]( http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374632)

filter.name: $filter
filter.description: Filter items by property values, see [OData Filtering]( http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374625)

search.name: $search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [OData Searching]( http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374633)
